attributes.action: save all saints day care centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All Saints is the only centre for physically disabled people living in merton
 most of the members only outings is when they attend all saints
if no club they sit indoors looking at four walls

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save all saints day care centre."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14649.asp

Prime Minister's Office
